item.title: Bitmain AntMiner R4 is Supposed to Bring Mining Back Home
item.description:
Bitmain AntMiner R4 is Supposed to Bring Mining Back Home

Bitmain is apparently setting a very ambitious goal of their new miner called AntMiner R4 and that goal is to bring back home mining of Bitcoin. What they are doing in order to get home miners' attention is trying to make the miner more compact and less noisy while still managing to provide quite a serious hashrate rated at 8.6 THS with just about 845 W of power usage.

item.title: Hyperledger Blockchain Project Elects New Tech Committee - CoinDesk
item.description:
Hyperledger Blockchain Project Elects New Tech Committee - CoinDesk

The Hyperledger project, the blockchain initiative led by the Linux Foundation, has elected a new technical steering committee (TSC). Launched late last year, the Hyperledger Project to date counts more than 40 established companies and startups among its membership. Voting for the body concluded earlier this week following a previously announced election period.

item.title: Coinbase Enables Bitcoin, Ethereum Buying via Mobile in Europe
item.description:
Coinbase Enables Bitcoin, Ethereum Buying via Mobile in Europe

Prominent bitcoin and Ethereum wallet and exchange Coinbase has unveiled a new feature to users in Europe who will now be able to purchase the digital currencies on their phones, using a payment card. Coinbase has announced that its European customers can now purchase bitcoin and Ethereum on their mobile phones using a credit or debit card.

item.title: Central Bank of Thailand Shuts Down Half of Bank ATMs Due To Malware Attack
item.description:
Central Bank of Thailand Shuts Down Half of Bank ATMs Due To Malware Attack

Malware continues to create financial losses all over the world. Criminals are targeting computer users, but also point-of-sale devices and ATms. A new ATM heist in Thailand saw 12 million baht being stolen. As a result, the central bank of Thailand was forced to shut down nearly half of its ATMs. For now, preliminary investigations seem to indicate an Eastern European gang is responsible for these attacks.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Big Picture In ETH/USD - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Big Picture In ETH/USD - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price looks like forming a monster range on the weekly time frame chart versus the US Dollar, which may stay for some time. Ethereum price looks like forming a monster range on the weekly time frame chart versus the US Dollar, which may stay for some time.

item.title: Satoshi Citadel Industries has acquired bitcoin investment app Keza
item.description:
Satoshi Citadel Industries has acquired bitcoin investment app Keza

Philippine Bitcoin fintech startup Satoshi Citadel Industries (SCI) has acquired bitcoin investment app Keza for an undisclosed sum. Founded in 2015, Keza allowed bitcoin users to invest in bitcoin or fixed income stocks in the United States or other international stock exchanges via a mobile app; the app allowed users to invest in three types of trading - modest, conservative and aggressive - allowing users to choose their level of exposure to volatile assets and keep tabs on risk to their capital.

item.title: China's Top Search Engine Freezes Bitcoin Ads Without Warning
item.description:
China's Top Search Engine Freezes Bitcoin Ads Without Warning

Baidu Inc. has quietly removed advertising for bitcoin and all other forms of virtual currency from its online service, two of China's largest bitcoin exchanges say, signaling a growing wariness over the proliferation of online scammers. The country's most popular search engine froze cryptocurrency ads from Thursday, according to local exchanges OKCoin and Huobi.

item.title: BITCOIN NEWS, PRICE & ANALYSIS - NEWSBTC.COM
item.description:
BITCOIN NEWS, PRICE & ANALYSIS - NEWSBTC.COM

NewsBTC is a Bitcoin news service that covers cryptocurrency news, technical analysis and forecasts for bitcoin, litecoin, dash, doge & digital currencies.

item.title: Bitcoin Unlimited Roadmap Includes Incentivized Network Nodes
item.description:
Bitcoin Unlimited Roadmap Includes Incentivized Network Nodes

Over the past few weeks, there is an increased interest in the Bitcoin unlimited development fork. As Bitcoin Core continues to work on its scalability solution, Bitcoin Unlimited secured funding for future development. The team has also released a brief roadmap of what will be in store over the coming months.

item.title: Bitmain Hints At Antminer R4 For At-home Bitcoin Mining
item.description:
Bitmain Hints At Antminer R4 For At-home Bitcoin Mining

Bitcoin mining at home has become nearly impossible these days. Not only are these devices expensive, but they also generate a ton of noise and heat. Moreover, electricity costs are going up in nearly every country, making mining unprofitable. Bitmain has unveiled their R4 miner, which is designed for home usage.
